Title: Requires the release of individuals from utility, phone and television contracts in instances of domestic violence
Summary: Clarifies the process for the release of individuals from utility, phone and television contracts in instances of domestic violence; changes the effectiveness of the provisions to June 30, 2023.
LawCode: Amd §§48-a & 91, Pub Serv L; amd §§399-cccc, 399-yy & 399-yyy, Gen Bus L; amd §6, Chap of 2022 (as proposed in S.7157-A & A.6207-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the general business law, in relation to requiring the release of individuals from utility, phone and television contracts in instances of domestic violence; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2022 amending the public service law and the general business law relating to requiring the release of individuals from utility, phone and television contracts in instances of domestic violence, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.7157-A and A.6207-B, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
